info.description:
This API provides endpoints to manage notebooks in a Kubernetes cluster.
For more information, visit https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/components/notebooks/
info.title: Kubeflow Notebooks API

get.description: Provides a healthcheck response indicating the status of key services.
get.summary: Returns the health status of the application

get.description: Provides a list of all namespaces that the user has access to
get.summary: Returns a list of all namespaces

get.description: Returns a list of all available workspace kinds. Workspace kinds define the different types of workspaces that can be created in the system.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of all available workspace kinds.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to list workspace kinds.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

parameters.description: Kubernetes YAML manifest of a WorkspaceKind
parameters.name: body

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to create WorkspaceKind.

409.description: Conflict. WorkspaceKind with the same name already exists.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large. The request body is too large.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type. Content-Type header is not correct.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Returns details of a specific workspace kind identified by its name. Workspace kinds define the available types of workspaces that can be created.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns the requested workspace kind details.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid workspace kind name format.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to access the workspace kind.

404.description: Not Found. Workspace kind does not exist.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Returns a list of all workspaces across all namespaces.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of all workspaces.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to list workspaces.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Returns a list of workspaces in a specific namespace.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of workspaces in the specified namespace.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to list workspaces.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description: Creates a new workspace in the specified namespace.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request body or namespace format.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to create workspace.

409.description: Conflict. Workspace with the same name already exists.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large. The request body is too large.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type. Content-Type header is not correct.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description: Pauses or unpauses a workspace, stopping or resuming all associated pods.

parameters.description: Intended pause state of the workspace
parameters.name: body

200.description: Successful action. Returns the current pause state.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to access the workspace.

404.description: Not Found. Workspace does not exist.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large. The request body is too large.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type. Content-Type header is not correct.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Workspace is not in appropriate state.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Returns details of a specific workspace identified by namespace and workspace name.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns the requested workspace details.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid namespace or workspace name format.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to access the workspace.

404.description: Not Found. Workspace does not exist.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

delete.description: Deletes a specific workspace identified by namespace and workspace name.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid namespace or workspace name format.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have permission to delete the workspace.

404.description: Not Found. Workspace does not exist.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.
